title: Quiz - CurrentTap - ESI - 16th to 22nd November 2022
instruction: The ___________ has launched the fourth phase of Digital Shakti Campaign, a pan-India project on digitally empowering and skilling women and girls in the cyberspace.  In line with its commitment to create safe spaces for women and girls online, Digital Shakti 4.0 is focused on making women digitally skilled and aware to stand up against any illegal/inappropriate activity online.

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Union Minister of State for Science & Technology has addressed the Healthcare Leaders’ summit 2022 organized by the ________________ on the topic of “Building a Cohesive Healthcare Ecosystem in India through Proactive Government Initiatives”.
options: United Nations Development Programme
World Health Organization
Economic Times
Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
AIIMS, Delhi

quiz.text: Operation Turtshield is an initiative of which of the following forces/organizations?
options: Indian Coast Guards
Indian Navy
Tamil Nadu Police
Wildlife Crime Control Bureau
Kerala Police

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to CITES?
options: It is an international agreement between governments.
It came into force in 1975.
Appendix III of CITES list species that are most endangered
Appendix II lists species which are not necessarily threatened with extinction but require close control on trade.
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to GHAR (GO Home and Re-Unite) Portal?
options: It has been launched by National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR).
Restoration and Repatriation of Child is the objective of the portal.
Portal enables Digital tracking and monitoring of children who are in the Justice Juvenile system.
It enables Digital transfer of cases of children.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Union Minister of Electronics & Information Technology has represented India at the Tokyo Summit of Global Partnership on Artificial Intelligence (GPAI). At the event, India has taken over the Council Chair of GPAI from which of the following countries?
options: Denmark
Mexico
France
United Kingdom
Australia

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to GPAI?

A. It was launched in the year 2020.

B. India joined the group in the year 2021.

C. It has 25 members.
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), the Australian parliament has ratified the Economic Cooperation and Trade Agreement (ECTA) with India. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to outcomes/expectations from the agreement?
options: The total bilateral trade will cross USD 45-50 billion in 5 years from existing USD 31 billion.
Australia will also allow duty-free import of Indian wines.
The Most Favoured Nation (MFN) status will be granted in about 120 sub-sectors.
Duty-free access to over 6,000 categories of Indian products in the Australian market.
Annual Visa quota of 18000 is to be instituted for India Yoga teachers and Chefs.

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), ‘Toilets 2.0’ campaign has been launched by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Jal Shakti
1 and 2
2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the thematic areas of the ‘Toilet 2.0’ campaign?
options: People for Toilets: Cleaning and maintaining the community and public toilets
Partners for Toilets: Adoption of Public toilets
Constructing Toilets: Construction Challenge
Rate your Toilet: Promoting user feedback to improve public toilets
My thoughts - Our Toilets: Gathering public opinion for toilets

quiz.text:
Which of the following ministries is/are involved in Mission Amrit Sarovar?

A.     Ministry of Rural Development

B.      Ministry of Jal Shakti

C.      Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

D.     Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
options: A and B
B, C and D
A, B and D
A, C and D
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: NIIF’s first bilateral fund, with contribution from GoI has been proposed through an MoU between National Investment and Infrastructure Fund Limited (NIIFL) and which of the following banks?
options: German Bank for International Development
Japan Bank for International Development
Singapore Bank for International Development
Australian Bank for International Development
French Bank for International Development

quiz.text: NIIF manages which of the following types of funds?
options: Master Fund
Fund of Funds
Wealth Fund
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Crisil has downgraded India’s GDP forecast for FY23 to 7% from its previous estimate of _____________.
options: 7.5%
7.3%
7.1%
7.6%
8.1%

quiz.text: Under the PESA Act, State legislature are empowered to frame all laws concerning to this act, subject to such exceptions and modifications as are provided in _________ of the Act.
options: Section 42
Section 9
Section 4
Section 12
Section 21

quiz.text: Which of the following is not one of the ten PESA states?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Andhra Pradesh
Gujarat
Telangana
Maharashtra

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), India and the European Union have signed an ‘Intent of Cooperation on High Performance Computing and Quantum Technologies’. This will facilitate cooperation in which of the following areas?
options: Bio-molecular medicines
Covid-19 therapeutics
Mitigating Climate Change
Quantum Computing
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), Ministry of Health & Family Welfare has introduced India’s 1st Suicide Prevention Policy. The policy looks at multi-sectoral collaborations to achieve reduction in suicide mortality by ____________ by 2030.
options: 5%
15%
20%
10%
25%

quiz.text: National Suicide Prevention Strategy will integrate a mental well-being curriculum in all educational institutions within the next _________ years.
options: two
five
eight
four
six

quiz.text: Which of the following countries is the co-chair of maiden India-ASEAN Defence Ministers’ Meeting along with India?
options: Indonesia
Cambodia
Vietnam
Malaysia
Laos

quiz.text: During the maiden India-ASEAN Defence Ministers meeting, Defence Minister of India proposed major initiatives for further expanding the scope and the depth of the India-ASEAN defence relations. Which of the following is/are the initiatives proposed by the minister?
options: India-ASEAN Initiative for Women in UN Peace Keeping Operations
India-ASEAN Initiative on Marine Plastic Pollution
India-ASEAN Initiative on Sustainable Fish Farming
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to India-EU Trade and Technology Council?
options: It is the first such trade and technology council set up by EU with any of its partners.
It allows both sides to set standards in crucial areas such as 5G and artificial intelligence.
It will seek to deepen cooperation in trade and security between India and the EU.
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), India has launched the official website of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) as it will host the next SCO summit as a chairman of organization in 2023. Which of the following countries hosted/chaired the 2022 SCO summit?
options: Russia
Uzbekistan
China
Kazakhstan
Tajikistan

quiz.text: India, along with Pakistan became members of the SCO grouping in which of the following years?
options: 2019
2012
2008
2015
2017

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Sugamya Bharat Abhiyan?

A. It was launched in 2014.

B. It was launched by Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs.

C. It operates on five pillars.
options: A and B
A only
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: Recently (Nov 2022), campaign for the Submission of Digital Life Certificates (DLC) has been organised by the Department of Pension & Pensioners’ Welfare. To promote the campaign, _______ & _______ joined hands with the Department and provided the Camp venues in different cities.
options: SBI; PNB
BoB; PNB
SBI; BoB
Canara Bank; SBI
UCO Bank; Bank of India

quiz.text: ‘Digital Shakti 4.0’ campaign has been launched by which of the following organizations?
options: National Commission for Women
Meta
CyberPeace Foundation
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: ‘Digital Shakti 4.0’ aims to sensitize more than _________ women across India on how to be safe online.
options: 20 million
50 million
5 million
1 million
10 million
